A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible pacing\, alot of downtime with the boring and pointless side-plot. Alot of shoehorned in comedic relief moments that are cringe worthy. Not to mention the movie's FIRST SCENE is a comedy moment. Pretending to be on hold? Really Star Wars? I audibly laughed out loud at multiple points in the movie (and they weren't the parts where they were trying to be funny.) Not too impressed with this one. Possible among the bottom 3 worst SW films in my opinion.
